review: On day of visit they re your refused to give us rooms. Kept us waiting for 2 hours. Alloted rooms in extremely bad conditions unclean rooms washrooms bad AC. . Extremely bad experience.  If they would have returned our money we would have immediately left it. Rooms at 4th floor No lifts
name: Dilip A

review: This property is good for friends and family. It may be little bit far from the city but it is very much peaceful. Staff is very good and friendly. They can give you all the information about the city and place. Food is really good.
name: garhwaliya
